# Payment Service

This is the Payment service

Generated with

```
micro new payment
```

## Usage

Generate the proto code

```
make proto
```

Add configure to consul

micro/config/alipay
```
{
    "notify_url":"https://www.fumm.cc",
    "app_id": "2016091200494382",
    "private_key":"",
    "is_prod":0
}
```

Run the service

```
micro run .
```
